attributes.action: UK Media/ News should be fined for coronavirus misinformation.
attributes.additional_details:
On the week leading up to Boris Johnson’s speech 10-MAY-2020 many the UK Media/ News were printing that lockdown would be completely lifted on 11-MAY-2020. 

This in turn prompted people to meet in masses in public places (parks etc.) and families to meet thus increasing the spread of the coronavirus. 

I believe this is a necessity step to protect the NHS stop the spread of the coronavirus.
attributes.background:
The UK Media/ News have misinformed the public many times throughout the coronavirus pandemic. 

The UK Media/ News should incur a penalty fine for each item of news that is deemed as misinformation that is produced.
